column2: "Aber a Ahaz hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe eduonu; na odzii hen mfe duesia wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ɔannyɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE n’enyiwa do
column3: dɛ n’egya David:"

column2: "mbom ɔnantseew Israel ahemfo akwan do
column3: no so ɔyɛɛ ehonyi a woegu maa Baalim."

column2: "Nkyii so ɔhyeew eduhuam wɔ Hinom ne ba no bɔnsa no mu
column3: na ɔhyeew ne mba wɔ ogya mu bɔɔ afɔr
column4: dɛ mbrɛ amanamamfo a EWURADZE tuu hɔn fii Israel enyim no hɔn ndzeyɛɛ tse."

column2: "Na ɔbɔɔ afɔr na ɔhyeew eduhuam wɔ mbea sorɔnsorɔm no do
column3: na nkokodo

column2: "Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn yii no hyɛɛ Siriahen nsa; na wɔkaa no gya
column3: na wɔfaa ne nyimpa mu piigyan ndɔmmum
column4: na wɔdze hɔn kɔr Damaskɔs. Eso oyii no hyɛɛ Israelhen nsa
column5: ɔno na ɔdze oku kɛse kaa no gya."

column2: "Na Remalia ne ba Peka kunkum Juda mu nyimpa mpemɔha eduonu da kor
column3: hɔn nyinara mbarimba a wɔyɛ ndam a; osiandɛ wɔapow EWURADZE

column2: "Na Zikri
column3: ɔbarimba katakyi bi a ofi Efraim
column4: kum ɔhen no ne ba Maaseia
column5: na ofi no do ɔhwɛfo Azrikam
column6: na Elkana a ɔyɛ ɔhen no n’ebedziekyir no."

column2: "Na Israelmba no faa hɔn nuanom mu nyimpa mpemahaenu ndɔmmum
column3: mbaa
column6: na wɔfaa asadze so piigyan wɔ hɔn ho kɔree
column7: na wɔdze asadze no kɔr Samaria."

column2: "Na EWURADZE no nkɔnhyɛnyi bi wɔ hɔ a ne dzin dze Oded: na ɔno na ofiir edzi kehyiaa dɔm a wɔbaa Samaria no
column3: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column6: hom egyanom Nyankopɔn no bo fuuw Juda ntsi
column7: na ɔdze hɔn ahyɛ hom nsa
column8: na hom dze ebufuw a ekodu ɔsor ekuku hɔn."

column2: "Na afei hom robɔ tsirmpɔw dɛ hom ribedzi Juda na Jerusalɛmmba no nya ayɛ nkowaa na mfonabaa ama hom ho. Ana homara so homankasa hom mbrato nndeda hom do wɔ hom EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn afamu bi a?"
"Dɛm ntsi afei hom ntsie me
column3: na hom mma dɔm a hom faa hɔn ndɔmmum wɔ hom nuanom mu no nsan nkɔ: na EWURADZE n’ebufuhyew no wɔ hom do."

column2: "Nna Efraimmba mu etsitsir no mu binom
column3: Johanan ne ba Azaria
column7: soɛrsoɛree tsiaa hɔn a wofi ɔsa bae no
column10: Mma hom mmfa ndɔmmumfo no mmba ha: na dza ɔdze asodzi a otsia EWURADZE bɛba hɛn do no ho na hom bɔ tsirmpɔw
column11: ma wɔdze bi aka hɛn bɔn na hɛn asodzii ho: na hɛn asodzii dɔɔ so

column2: "Nna mbarimba a woemia no gyaa ndɔmmumfo na asadze no wɔ mbapɔmba na mboanofo no nyinara enyim."
"Na mbarimba a wɔabobɔ hɔn edzin no soɛrsoɛree
column3: na wɔfaa ndɔmmumfo no
column4: na wɔdze asadze no bi furafuraa hɔn a wodzi adagyaw wɔ hɔn mu no
column7: na wɔmaa hɔn biribi ma wodzii na wɔnomee
column9: na wɔdze hɔn a wɔyɛ mberɛw wɔ hɔn mu no nyinara tsenatsenaa nsoasopɔnkɔ mpɔnkɔ do
column12: wɔ hɔn nuanom nkyɛn: na Israelfo no sanee kɔr Samaria."

column2: "Aber no mu na ɔhen Ahaz somae ma wɔkɔr Asiria ahemfo no hɔ dɛ wɔmbɔboa no."
"Osiandɛ Edomfo no baa bio bɛkaa Juda gya
column3: na wɔfaa ndɔmmumfo kɔree."

column2: "Filistiafo no so ebotua ɔbɔnmu nkurow
column3: na Juda Pomu afamu nkurow no
column7: na Soko nye no nkurobaase na Timna nye no nkurobaase; Gimzo so na no nkurobaase: na wɔtsenaa hɔ."

column2: "Na osian Israelhen Ahaz ntsi EWURADZE brɛɛ Juda adze; osiandɛ ɔayɛ Juda mu akɔhwidze
column3: na ɔafom EWURADZE yayaayaw."

column2: "Na Asiriahen Tilgat-pilneser baa ne nkyɛn
column3: na ɔbɛtseetsee no

column2: "Na Ahaz faa EWURADZE ne fie
column3: na ɔhen no na ahenmba fie adze na ɔdze maa Asiriahen no: naaso iyi mpo ammboa no papa biara."

column2: "Na n’ahohia mber mu mpo na ɔhen Ahaz yi foom EWURADZE dodoodow."
"Na ɔbɔɔ afɔr maa Damaskɔsfo a wɔkaa no gya no hɔn enyame: na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Osiandɛ Siria ahemfo hɔn enyame no boaa hɔn no ntsi
column4: emi so mobɔbɔ afɔr ama hɔn
column5: ama wɔaaboa me. Mbom wɔyɛɛ ɔno

column2: "Na Ahaz boaboaa Nyankopɔn fie ndzɛmba no ano
column3: na otwitwaa Nyankopɔn fie ndzɛmba no mu esinesin
column4: na ɔtotoow EWURADZE fie mbobow no mu; na osisii afɔrmbukyia wɔ Jerusalɛm kutuw biara do."

column2: "Na oyiyii mbea sorɔnsorɔm wɔ Juda kurow biara mu
column3: dɛ wɔnhyew eduhuam mma enyame fofor
column4: na ɔdze dɛm yii EWURADZE n’egyanom hɔn Nyankopɔn no ebufuw."

column2: "Afei no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: na n’akwan nyinara
column4: kan dze na ekyir dze no
column6: wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Juda na Israel ahemfo nwoma no mu."

column2: "Na Ahaz kɔr ne nsamankyir
column3: na wosiee no wɔ kurow no mu
column5: Jerusalɛm mu; na wɔammfa no ammba Israel ahemfo hɔn asamandan no mu: na ne babanyin Hezekia dzii hen wɔ n’ananmu."
